system.description:
A tiny natural creature you touch (such as a mouse or moth) regards you as a friend for the spell's duration.

You may give the creature one command, which it tries to complete to the best of its ability and intelligence even after the spell ends.

If the command would directly harm the creature, it abandons the task.
